Other R tools (not necessarily active, vet them first) useful for starting new projects.

* [`usethis`](https://usethis.r-lib.org/) in general, [`create_project()` and `create_package()` in particular](https://usethis.r-lib.org/reference/create_package.html). starters actually depends on usethis.

* [`skeletor`](https://github.com/nealrichardson/skeletor), An R Package Skeleton Generator.

* [`mkrpkg`](https://github.com/noamross/mkrpkg), Template for making R packages.

* [`mason`](https://github.com/metacran/mason), A friendly craftsman that builds you great R packages.
